website_summaries.verdict: This is a rugged little speaker that can go with you all day, from your morning shower to the great outdoors and everywhere in between.
pros: Compact and easy to take with you
Strap included for hanging the speaker
cons: A few complaints of the Bluetooth connection randomly dropping

customer_reviews.title: How do we kill it?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what’s going on with this thing - it’s been a month and we haven’t charged it yet. At least, I dont know, 30-40 hours of playtime in and the battery icon when you connect to a phone still says its full. Is someone sneaking in and charging it at night, or have we somehow stumbled into the solution for sustainable energy? Could I run a car off of this thing? Should I send it to the DOE for examination? Are we already the unwitting subjects of a government experiment? Are we safe around this thing? I am afraid.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Won’t make this mistake again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these speakers about three or four years ago. It was a decent speaker so when it died I ordered another. The new speaker is terrible. The sound and connectivity is the same but the battery life is terrible. I’ve had it for less than one year and on a full charge it lasts maybe 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Its worth what you pay for and then some.
customer_reviews.text: It started off gret as many things do when you first buy stuff. This proved true in this purchase, i took this thing everywhere river camping and to pool days within the first month if having it. BUt entering into the second month proved a challenge the battery would only last 3.5 hours after leaving it to charge overnight off not evne on. It was great for the little time i had the sound was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon  Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Extremely water resistant + great sound
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs one or more of these! My first one went to the bottom of the pool and still works perfectly. My second one was purchased to replace a much more expensive item by a company that rhymes with “rose” that just decided to stop working after being pampered it’s whole life. I could buy six of these for the price of that one. 10+ hours on a charge. Great sound even at high volume. Really Waterproof so shower singers rejoice!! 🚿 🎤 🎶. Price point and durability make them great gifts for kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pineau

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stream music from my phone while working indoors and out. Thru heavy dust, rain, and dropping a couple times this speaker still works like new. Very long battery life and good bass if you put it close to a wall or other surface. The only thing- wish there was a way to mute it when a call comes thru. Turning off the bluetooth on my phone does the trick. After I reconnect it fires right back up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't play very loudly at max volume
customer_reviews.text: I bought to have a shower speaker in my bathroom and it's mostly satisfying except for the volume control. When turnned all the way up, it sounds like a medium noise level. I know it's the shower noise contributing to this but this is marketed as a shower speaker. Will return and try something else.
customer_reviews.author: FrecklesNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you are reading through the reviews trying to decide if this is what you want. It is. The sound quality and volume are great. I use it in the shower, so it gets wet every day. I have had it a couple of months and am still impressed. Are there better Bluetooth speakers out there? Not at this price point! Not that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy O. Morford

customer_reviews.title: Already Not Working!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to edit my review. This has been only lightly used, and I have 2 major issues with it: # When I attach my iPod with the cable, the sound cuts in and out, mostly OUT. GRRR! #2 When it pairs to my laptop via Bluetooth, the audio does NOT come through the AYL speaker, only my laptop. However, it shows that it is paired, so what am I not getting??? Having a heck of a time figuring out how to contact the manufacturer, they state it has a 3 year warranty. I even purchased extra device protection. They tell me to contact the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Sandvick

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 4 years (2017-2020) Lite-intermittent use..
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it much- it was good as a voice only speaker- such as news, youtube tutorials- or reviews. It straight up stopped working- power button won't do anything- no reset button on the version i have- Would i order again? Sure! For the price- it's not so bad- but i opted for the one you can pair with another speaker for stereo sound....
customer_reviews.author: Index

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Beats🎶
customer_reviews.text: Looking for sound on a budget? Look no more, this thing pumps. Sound/clarity, volume and bass are more than satisfactory (actually a bit loud in my little bathroom). It's heavy with a solid build, no flimsy piece of junk. For $20 I honestly don't know how it could be a better buy. *Range is a little short. *Screen seems like it could rust with prolonged exposure to moisture/humidity. Could use a layer of poly coating to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Herman

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this product I intend to buy a second! This is the first Bluetooth connected device I have ever purchased, but use it every day, in the shower, on the back porch, on the bike trail (I am going to build a mount on my bike for it), on my kayak, on my jetski- no, I'm not joking!! It's waterproof and I love it!! Room for improvement- better viewing of the buttons- I added a label to show purposes of the buttons
customer_reviews.author: Steven D King

customer_reviews.title: AAHHMAZING sound quality and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who wanted a Bluetooth speaker that was waterproof so she could listen to her music while she showered. The sound on this little speaker is Aahhmazing!!! She loves it! Now I need to get one! Highly recommend this. She can even take it outdoors because it is sturdy and weather resistant!
customer_reviews.author: GameCrazy

customer_reviews.title: best little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sound is decent battery life is ok I can listen to the music for a couple of days and small size will be great for take it to fishing or camping. I got this because of when I am going to fishing I like to bring some like this with me .I have not yet going fishing with this speaker yet.will see. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Boney maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great little durable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this speaker is a steal. We’ve put it to the test against water and impact, and it just doesn’t care. The sound quality is good and the volume is nice for a speaker this size. Battery life is as advertised, no issue there. I’ve since bought a second one and had the same experience there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Plainshow

customer_reviews.title: Original and Replacement Both Defective
customer_reviews.text: After charging the speaker for a little less than an hour, I proceeded to test the unit. It synced easily with my phone. Sound quality was sub par, but I was not expecting much from a $20 speaker. However, I quickly discovered that their was a defect with the volume "+" button. Every time I pressed the button, regardless of length of time held down, the unit would turn off. I then requested an exchange. The replacement arrived in less than 48hrs. Again, there was an issue with one of the controls. The play/pause button would not work on this unit when synced with my device. Decided to cut my losses and request a refund... Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker 2+ years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this speaker for over 2 years now and this is the first time writing a review for it. First thing first after 2 years it’s still as loud as the first day I bought it. The battery life is still good I can’t complain about anything the price isn’t bad this is a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Evelise

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended, Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sound clips, not satisfied Should have paid a bit more and bought another JBL
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is terrible. First, they sent me a dirty, used speaker. I reached out wondering how this could possibly happen. Heard nothing back of course. Sound quality is terrible, your phone has to be right next to it for it to even work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky W.

customer_reviews.title: Solid little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for about 6 years and it still works great in the shower and love hooking up to my phone or computer to listen to youtube videos, or other videos online. You can connect via Bluetooth or audio cord, both sound great.
customer_reviews.author: G. Akiyama

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, but serious problems with re-charging
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the speaker is excellent for the price. I never used the Bluetooth, but use it with an MP3 player. I bought two of these speakers. The main problem after 1-2 months is that they don't properly recharge anymore. Originally they can player for 7-8 hrs when fully charged. Now the stop playing after 1-2 hours no matter what I do. It's too bad, now I have to keep looking for another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 weeks....then housing began to split and sound quality sucked. It literally sat on my boat a handful of times. No drops or anything, just started to come apart. Def not waterproof anymore due to the gap in the housing
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a small speaker to carry at work out in the field. I work in rough environments and didn't want buy an expensive Bose speaker only to see it get ruined. This little speaker does a great job, sound quality is not the same as a high end Bose, but for what I paid I am very happy. The sound is actually much better than I expected and does not leave me wishing I had spent more. Battery life has been great and bluetooth is solid. Great little product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent speakers
customer_reviews.text: It's good enough for the price and what it's supposed to do. I use it as my car speaker since my car doesn't have Bluetooth. The fact that it's water proof is great! I get to use it while in the shower. If you turn it off completely then reconnecting to Bluetooth can at times be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: speacker review
customer_reviews.text: So fare what I have received the speaker look great feels Sturdy feels strong. The sound is good i yet haven't Took in it out riding but I will and ill come back with a further review the one thing that was Disappointing was it did not come with the mount for the bike If you're gonna show the product mountain on a bike is should come with the mount that's kind of discouraging when you open it up and amounts night in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent communication and fast shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered just as described and is a great value for the price. I prefer a little more bass but the sound quality is still pretty good and even for such a compact and portable speaker. So far the water resistance has been great.... Going on shower run number 4
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great. Sound. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away at the sound coming from this tiny inexpensive speaker. It rivals my JBL dock and my Bose dock. I am a stickler for sound quality & you really have to depend on the reviews for these items. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Roether

customer_reviews.title: very rugged, lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every day for almost 4 years, often in the shower. The battery is still strong. The sound is really good. Easy to use. The charging port has a loose connection now, so I am ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Good compact Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bluetooth speaker paired with my cellphone so far, working good with it so far. Compact should be weather resistance to stand up to rain has a mounting threaded spot on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: blade

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can actually hear the music over the sound of the shower. Great design and a faster Bluetooth connection than my Bose earphones. The unit is rugged and the buttons are easy to find even with soap in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Bluetooth didn't work with my audiobook experience.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to amplify my audiobooks while in the shower. I use the cord, because there was skipping in the middle of listening when I had it hooked up via Bluetooth and I was missing parts of speech in my books. The cord is perfect, though, as my tablet is also portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strongly and well built
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and loud for the price. Bigger then expected but it has very clear speaker with decent little bass. Built well to with stand A LOT of dropping i can tell. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker I think 6months, maybe more. I use it every day in the shower and its still going strong. It works really well still. Great little speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M Maher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy waterproof Bluetooth rechargeable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little bluetooth speaker for a good price. Comes with a padded mesh bag, alternative handle and carabiner. It’s sturdy and can be thrown in a backpack or used in the shower. Simple to set up Bluetooth and with very intuitive design. It’s better than I expected it to be and I would definitely buy it again or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality for a shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have gone thru like 4 "shower speakers" and their sound always sucks and they don't last long. This one sounds GREAT and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Barely Audible
customer_reviews.text: From the first use, the sound quality and audibility is greatly reduced once the battery starts to be used, as opposed to having it plugged in. The audio gets so low that my mobile phone is louder. Waste of money and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susan a keyock

customer_reviews.title: Great Item at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This shower bluetooth radio was purchased for my teen. He loves it, his phone can be down stairs and still comes in loud and clear. Shopped around alot and this had the best reviews and at a great price. Have already recommended this item to friends.
customer_reviews.author: j hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with our Bose portable speaker holding a charge and didn't want to spend another $120.00, Rolled the dice on this and looks like a winner. Nice construction, good sound quality and so far the battery outlasts the BOSE.
customer_reviews.author: printman74

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: It's got a great sound! The bass produced by one of the songs i was playing caused it to fall off a platform i had it on down 12". That little fall caused it to break open. I glued it back together, but it says something about ther quality of the build.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Dog proof also
customer_reviews.text: Loud and tough. Way louder than my JBL with a way longer battery life. I haven’t test the waterproof yet but definitely tough. The first day my dog got a hold of it thinking it was her toy and started throwing it around. I’ll be damn that thing was even phased.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Row

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but does rust
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for first 6 months then it started to rust Unsure how shower proof it really is Was never placed directly in water But hung on outdoor shower door
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Could be pairing issues
customer_reviews.text: It did not pair up with my HP laptop, which is why it was purchased. It did pair up quickly with my phone and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best small blue tooth speaker. Husband loved his so much I got one. They are so reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sides

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound
customer_reviews.text: I have not use this item yet, but it came early. It was very nice I didn't have to wait. I love music. I didn't get enough instructions to use connect product to my stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Minter

customer_reviews.title: It will hold up
customer_reviews.text: Buddy of mine bought this speaker mimicking a Klein speaker speaker I have. Exact same thing except this speaker doesn’t have a magnet behind it but does come with a nice strap. This one also has perforated screens on both sides of the speaker while the Klein doesn’t. Good deal overall considering.
customer_reviews.author: Zachry S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor and pool speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for an island resort trip and it worked great. Not able to say much more just yet. Lightweight, great sound, easy to connect!
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For such a small handy speaker at half the cost of a brand name one this thing sounds awesome!! Some brand name ones are not water proof & this one is! I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. After two weeks, the battery refuses to charge regardless of how long I leave it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Egbert

customer_reviews.title: What’s that noise?
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well but there’s something rattling inside like an internal screw so I’m thinking it won’t last much longer. I’ve had it for 1.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: D Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, sound and water resistance. However, I can only get through about 3 showers and I have to recharge. That's just not acceptable. What's the point.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker holds up well on camp outs and on trips to the beach. Great sound quality and the battery lasts a long time. It is definitely waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Listen to lots of French bistro style music all summer in our BBQ area. So fun to have this. Sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The person that received this as a gift was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker! Bought for home use in the kitchen or living room area to listen to music. Don't have to turn my phone or the speaker on full volume to use. Excited to bring it into the backyard this summer for bbq season! Buy this speaker. You'll love it! Bonus: speaker was packaged well, shipping was fast and seller keeps great communication.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: Kids love to shower now that they can sing to music. Our cellphone has to be about 12 feet away for best connectivity but it suits our needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Cathib

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sits on my treadmill and keeps me going! I would be SO bored if I didn't have this to play my Pandora.
customer_reviews.author: dobiegirls

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for product and company
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Seller checked up with me via email to make sure everything was working. Love it when I get a good product and a company that cares.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonkat

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, durable, water resistant and easy price.
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a shower speaker mostly, but works great everywhere. Dropped it many times and not a scratch. Proof that price does not dictate quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan enyart

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is amazing. We take it out by the pool or listen inside. I highly recommend it!! It is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I was super surprised at how good this sounded based on the price I paid. I use it regularly and rarely need to charge it. The only thing I wish I could do was skip songs from the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: KCarson

customer_reviews.title: Great, Waterproof, light, portable, and reasonable sound
customer_reviews.text: Got this for travelling and multi-day rafting trips. It is not super loud, but the strap makes it easy to clip on, the battery life seems pretty good, and its light enough to trow in a carry on bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Still amazing years later
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years and I love it still. It has held up for ages and it continues to have great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hatler

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: have purchased about 6 of these for my family and friends and we all love it. The sound is super loud for a small speaker, is water and dust resistant. My husband does auto body and paint and it has been dusty and still works great he can go days without charging it!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Could use a little more bass. But great speaker, especially for the price. Battery lasted over 4 hours at the beach in Cocoa Fl.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use it for talk radio, mostly. It sounds good and it’s loud enough. The battery lasts a long time. If you leave it in the shower it will rust. While it’s not amazing, it has preformed well for a cheap speaker. I’ve had it since June 12, 2020. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Destro

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and battery life is decent. It seems really durable but haven't really tested durability too much yet. Can be annoying to connect your device to it, randomly it won't show up.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase at price point
customer_reviews.text: Solid sound quality at the price point! It’s been banged around off road in my jeep, and soaked in the shower, and so far it connects perfectly and plays consistently. Haven’t really tested battery life yet, but, with that as an unknown, I’d recommend this speaker for affordable and regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, clips right on my belt. Listen to podcasts all day while working outside, in driving rain more than a few times. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: I use this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got this to bring as a dirty santa gift and after seeing the lame doo doo gifts my siblings brought I ended up stealing my own gift back. It has served me well over the years. Super practical, not ridiculously loud but will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Grider

customer_reviews.title: 5-Star quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: A good, easy-to-use bluetooth speaker for the price. Decent battery life and pretty good sound quality for such a small unit. If you don't want high-end sound, but you do want portability, this little speaker is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good small, portable and waterproof speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not amazing but what can you expect from a speaker at this cost and size. It still packs a pretty good punch, its louder than my phone speaker at least. Battery last a long time and I've dropped it in the shower a few times when it was covered in water and still works great
customer_reviews.author: KingEli

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but no skip
customer_reviews.text: I just didn't like it didn't have a skip feature- that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana R.

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy its everyday use. If only I sounded this good!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: After almost 4yrs of purchasing it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I’m still using this until now, almost 4 yrs still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: In the short time that I’ve owned this s it has performed well. That’s what I expect from AYL. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This speaker will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! Sound quality is great and loud. Battery lasts long and very easy to use. It’s durable and great for outdoors. My daughter dropped in the sink and works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Garcia Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Took it to float down the river in a tube.the speaker got wet and stopped working brought it home let it dry out and now it works again. Definitely not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyP

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This really shipped fast, thanks. The speaker is small but it has great sound! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is easy to use, has decent sound quality, and has good battery life. We've been using it for about three months now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this speaker. The only problem I had was the toggle closure on the storage bag it comes in broke immediately so I cannot close it. Otherwise this is an awesome speaker with great quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great, surprisingly good sound quality. Glad I saved dough over the ones at box stores.
customer_reviews.author: JGlass

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to pair, sounds great. You can use it as well in the house, office, car......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. MOM

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: It’s a squatty and loud, reliable littile speaker. Came with a bag to hold it in as well as a caribiner to clasp onto bookbags etc. It is waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice in a rechargeable Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, well built. Connects easily, controls are simple and switch feel is solid. I use it in the shower and outside while doing chores. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Dave

customer_reviews.title: 1 year strong
customer_reviews.text: Best IPX6 speaker for the money. Buy without fear. 👍 had mine over a year and its still going strong with predictable loss in battery life in that time for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband three years ago and it’s still going strong. He goes atving a lot and it’s going through quiet a bit and hasn’t given up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much higher quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality blew me away. Lasts a good long while on a single charge and have not had any issues in moderate rain or in a shower/pool area. Great speaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i was looking for in the shower. It sounds great and is completely waterproof. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: laura lozano

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch! The sound quality is excellent and it can get very loud. The operation buttons are easy to use. The best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, better sound than I expected. I use it in my kayak and home gym. Incredible deal at $20.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Choppy playback
customer_reviews.text: When listening to an audiobook the sound is choppy even with no obstructions between my phone and the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take river tubing and it worked great. No issues and good sound.
customer_reviews.author: CaryMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. The battery lasts a lot longer than the 8-10 hours claimed, and the sound is great. It's way better that some of the brands you'd pay 3-4x as much for.
customer_reviews.author: nick mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should purchase
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is hard to connect to via bluetooth, because it doesnt have a bluetooth button it sends out signals as soon as its turned on. Overall the speaker is waterproof and very loud. Great product I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Speaker stopped working after 2 months use-only used in shower Started crackling and you can barely hear sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: Carried it in my backpack on a hike and took it to the beach - gets loud. Would like a couple more controls on the device itself but I think I'm still getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: student1234

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little speaker. It has a long battery life, and I’m pleased with the sound. I waited a while to write my review to ensure the speaker continued to perform so well. It has.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I am familiar with this product because a family member has purchased 2 others just like it but different colors. The one I purchased is even nicer looking than the picture provided. I love this green color.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Good for kayak
customer_reviews.text: Paddled up and down the canal for hours and the battery was still almost full. For such a small speaker it has both good sound and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus

customer_reviews.title: Better than I dreamed
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my husbands golf cart and for the campground. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great for a small speaker and the battery lasts for much longer than the stated time.
customer_reviews.author: nick maurer

product_meta.title: Portable Outdoor Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker- Wireless 10 Hour Rechargeable Battery Life, Powerful 5W Audio Driver, Pairs Easily to All Bluetooth Devices, Phones, Tablets, Computers, Soundfit (Green)
feature_bullets: BEST SOUNDING SHOWER SPEAKER: Top Rated shower & outdoor Bluetooth speakers feature audio with stronger bass and higher quality sound. Perfect for Outdoor Sports, Travel, Bicycle/Bike, Cycling, Climbing, Camping, Hiking, Running, Fishing Use. Lifetime Warranty.

QUICK & EASY TO PAIR: AYL SoundFit Bluetooth shower speaker & outdoor speaker uses Bluetooth 5.0 technology, and it pairs with portable devices much more quickly than other portable Bluetooth speakers. The wireless speakers outdoor & shower range is 33 feet, so you can listen to your device even when it's far away.

True Water-Resistant: AYL SoundFit Bluetooth Speakers Waterproof level IPX6 – highest level of Water-Resistant - protected against low pressure water stream from any angle. It will stay safe in the shower, in the rain, by the pool or on a boat! We built this speaker extra tough, even shock proof, to ensure that it can be safely carried anywhere life's adventures take you! (Incase the speaker soaks wet, just use dry towel or hair dryer (Cold/Warm air mode) to dry the speaker)

LISTEN ON & ON: Our wireless shower speaker has a high capacity battery that can provide up to 12 hours of endless music, even at 80% volume! The Bluetooth speakers outdoor model can be recharged in just 3 hours with the included Micro USB cable! That's much faster than other outdoor wireless speakers.

LIFETIME WARRANTY & UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Our portable speakers can be paired with all types of devices that use Bluetooth technology! Use the water-resistant Bluetooth speaker to stream music from an iPhone or Android smartphone, an iPad or Android tablet, an iPod Touch or even a computer or laptop with Bluetooth.
